lines: 1. Bororo, gwechand'okonge,Biarosia chinkoro,Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,Yeso nare ang'e.
Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,Kalwari, Kalwari,Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,Yeso nare ang'e.
2. Tigera Yes'onsi rero,Bwoba n'ogwechanda,Mbigusuigwe aria Kaiwari,Yeso nare ang'e.
3. Mochandeku Yes'Arora,mechando, mariga,Mbigusuigwe aria Kalwari,Yeso nare ang'e.
